'''The Ring Goes South''' is the eleventh track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' by [[Howard Shore]]. As it is played, the [[Fellowship of the Ring|Fellowship]] travels South, passing [[Ost-in-Edhil]] and approaching [[Moria]]. It is completely instrumental.
